name: evcc
description: evcc is an EV charging controller that optimizes car charging based on solar production, tariffs, and household loads. It connects to wallboxes, inverters, and meters, and offers a web UI to monitor and configure charging behavior.
features: Solar Optimization: Charge your EV with excess solar power. Maximize self-consumption.
Tariff Awareness: Charge during cheap electricity periods. Minimize charging costs.
Wallbox Control: Manage charging stations intelligently. Smart power distribution.
Load Management: Balance household and EV consumption. Prevent grid overload.
Web Dashboard: Monitor and control charging remotely. Complete visibility.
Self-Hosted: Run your own EV charging controller. Complete energy independence.
